content.rendered:
TIKTOK

PARTNER

AGENCY

Let's start now!

Let's launch your first

campaign

We have been making unskippable TikToks for different brands at scale.

First, we make a strategy and plan the ideas. Then, we create and produce the content, publish it and manage customized boost strategies to reach the goals of the campaign on the most viral platform.

Let's launch
your first campaign

We have been making unskippable TikToks for different brands at scale.

First, we make a strategy and plan the ideas. Then, we create and produce the content, publish it and manage customized boost strategies to reach the goals of the campaign on the most viral platform.

WHY TIKTOK?

With +1 billion active users globally, TikTok is the leading short-form video platform where originality is celebrated and trends are born. A place where brands of all sizes and industries get exposure, increase followers, promote global connections and achieve huge results.

Let’s bring your brand

where your target is

ACCOUNT STRATEGY

First, let’s clarify needs! Setting up a strategy with SMART objectives is key to the success of any TikTok strategy.

CREATIVITY

Brainstorming time! The creation of stories to promote the brand/product is the hook to captivate your audience.

PRODUCTION

Let’s get to work! The funniest part of the process: the creation of personalized content for your audience that follow trends and the tone of your brand.

ADS & PROMOTION

Reach your audience! The management and optimization of TikTok ADS makes it easier to reach the objectives.

ar filters

Be trendy! Through the design and development of AR filters for the platform your target will have fun creating personalized videos.

SONY

@housetok.21

doodles

@doodlestok

THM

@todoshacemosmusica

Let's start now!
